Summary: A bright lite just hovering right over my apt.
divs: Sighting Details went outside to lock my car and i looked up and there it was just hovering i watch it for about 5 minute.it just was siting there didnt move could of bin a helicopter cause i saw no other lites just one brite lite i knew it wasnt a star because i could see it rocking side to side then i went in my apt.came back out 1hour later it was still there
trends: There has been one other sighting in Trevose
There were no other sightings in Trevose on or around January 22nd 2009
